basics.name: Michael Stoffer
basics.label: Senior Full-Stack Developer
basics.summary: Passionate web developer with drive and compassion for what he does for a living.

highlights: Upgraded the WiFi to cover 9 buildings with over a 200,000+ sq. ft. radius
Launched a new Marketplace site to help the Service & Support Departments
Upgraded the company’s in-house servers to a virtualized environment

work.summary: Every day we continued to improve on the system to make the lives of Financial Advisors easier.
highlights: Applied extensive knowledge of programming to everyday tasks to build a highly custom CRM/Marketing system for the Financial Market.

work.summary: Applied extensive technical and leadership skills and experience to oversee the organization’s programming and IT functions, including scheduling daily tasks for developers to work on for the day, creating and completing a programming priority list, and assisting staff with computer problems, such as problems with email or internet.
highlights: Established company servers with ability to scale with massive traffic increases. (1,000 - 25,000 in a matter of seconds)
Improved look and feel of all (20) company websites to continue traffic generation (100,000 - 7,500,000 monthly views).

work.summary: Managed various IT duties, including writing web application software for the Hospitality industry, maintaining the company development and production servers, and answering Level 3 technical support calls at all time of the day/night.
highlights: Successfully wrote several applications to increase company’s bottom line.
Helped many clients through challenging and complex support issues, eventually leading to more clients using help services and contributing to the bottom line.
